summary: Building an app to help people avoid oversleeping with photo accountability
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist alarm clock icon illustration for the wake-up feature (alarm-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Hero banner image with motivational morning theme showing sunrise colors (wake-hero.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a playable Snake game with a snake that moves continuously in the current direction and grows longer when eating food
Implement arrow key controls to change the snake's direction
Implement collision detection for game over conditions when snake hits walls or itself
Display current score that increments each time the snake eats food
Add restart functionality to start a new game after game over
Create a visually engaging game interface with a distinct creative theme including colors, typography, and layout that creates a cohesive gaming experience
Create a wake-up time setting interface where users can set their target wake-up time
Implement a timer that tracks the current time against the set wake-up time and calculates how many minutes late the user is
Add photo capture functionality that allows users to take or upload a photo of themselves wearing clothes
Enforce photo upload requirement when user wakes up late, preventing them from dismissing or continuing until photo is submitted
Display a history or log showing past wake-up times, whether user was on time or late, and minutes late for each occurrence
Integrate Internet Identity authentication to enable multi-user support where each user has their own wake-up settings and photo records

new_feature_requests.summary: Set wake-up time and require photo upload of getting dressed if late
Store wake-up time settings and photo submission records in the backend to persist user accountability data
